pages.text:
5-Star Event Company
From the moment you enter the Addison’s banyan covered courtyard, you step into a world where gracious dining and entertaining are always in style. Built in 1926 by acclaimed architect, Addison Mizner, our Boca Raton historic estate is the perfect unique, elegant, and picturesque backdrop for any type of event. Our event company's attention to detail, unparalleled service, and award-winning catering will ensure your guests, and you, leave delighted and impressed.  Rated the best South Florida event company.
Types of Events
Off-Premise Catering
Whether in your home, or at your venue of choice, our award-winning signature cuisine can be enjoyed almost anywhere.
Read more
Weddings
Addison is the premier wedding reception venue of South Florida.   Say "I do" in a romantic courtyard under a canopy of 100 year old banyan trees.
Read more
Corporate Venue Events in Boca Raton
With versatile settings, audio video technology, and unparalleled service, the Addison is the ideal venue for corporate events in Boca Raton.
Read more
Social Events
Our unique setting and its variety of private rooms makes the Addison the perfect party venue to host any social or religious event.
Read more
Glatt Kosher Events
Our ORB certified catering has been nationally recognized and awarded. Settle for nothing less than the best in glatt kosher events.
Read more
Addison Signature Events
Join us for one of our very special holidays, when we open to the public, and enjoy our award-winning menus and beautiful historic property.
Read more

Signature Events & Holiday Party Venue
Many in our community sentimentally remember the Addison as a fine-dining restaurant and reminisce about the memories made while dining on property, or indulging in a happy hour. Today our venue is dedicated exclusively to private events, but a few times a year we open to the public so our past patrons, loyal clientele, and cherished community can come back to savor our delicious cuisine and unwind in our enchanted courtyard. We are proud to present our line of signature events, providing South Florida with the ultimate holiday party venue to celebrate their favorite special occasions and holidays. Come see why everyone loves our Boca Raton holiday party venue.  We hope to see you at our next event!
Mother's Day Brunch
Join us for a beautiful Mother’s Day Brunch at the Addison, featuring our Five-Star Diamond cuisine, unlimited bubbles and wine, live music, and a delightful experience for the whole family. Treat Mom to a special day with elegant dining, a charming atmosphere, and plenty of photo opportunities to capture the memories!
Reservations are available from 11:00 am to 2:00 pm.
Call 561.372.0568 to confirm your table.
Adults $160++ | Ages 12 and under $85++
Complimentary for under the age of 3.
Service charge and tax apply.

Glatt Kosher Catering & Wedding/Event Venue
When it comes to full-service glatt kosher catering in Boca Raton, the Addison does not settle for less than exceptional service and cuisine. Under the supervision of the Orthodox Rabbinical Board (ORB), the highest standards are employed and our attention to detail is unparalleled. Whether planning a kosher wedding, mitzvah catering, celebration, or corporate affair, the Addison kosher caterer prides itself on client-satisfaction through best-in-class menu execution, and service - all while maintaining compliance with the strictest dietary guidelines. Not just a kosher wedding venue, but we can come to you!  In 2015, the American Institute of Hospitality Sciences awarded the Addison their first ever Five Star Diamond for glatt kosher catering in South Florida. Our kosher event venue serves you at any location.  We relish the opportunity to help you plan your next kosher catering event, and to delighting your guests.
Start Planning
Gallery
Testimonials
I attended an event at the Addison through the Jewish Federation. When the host told us our lunch was glatt kosher, I didn't believe her! It was delicious and absolutely perfect!
Melissa B.
Aug 31, 2017
